subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text: Derived from Etymology 2. Displaced common {{cog|sit}} {{och-l|目|eye}} in many dialects.

subSections.title: Etymology 1
subSections.text:
{{ja-kanjitab|まなこ|yomi=k}}
Compound of {{m|ja|目|tr=ma||eye}} + {{m|ja|の|tr=no|pos=genitive case}} + {{m|ja|子|tr=ko|pos=nominalizing suffix}}. Initial ''ma'' is the unbound form of {{m|ja|目|tr=me|pos=id}}.

subSections.title: Noun
subSections.text:
{{ja-noun|まなこ}}

# the pupil; also, the eyes in general
#* c. '''790''': ''Daihannya-kyō Ongi'' (Ishiyamadera manuscript, page 34)
#*: 眼晴 [...] 倭言'''麻那古'''
